transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Yes. 
Customer: Sir woh baat kar raha hu mai IndiaMART se. Actually sir abhi mera primary number pe baat hua tha.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Hello aawaz aa rahi hai meri?
Executive: Bolo, bolo aawaz aa raha hai bolo.
Customer: Aapne ek mail kiya tha ki aapke leads vagera hai na woh mold ka nahi aa raha hai. Hai na? To haan to usi ko leke mai number pe discuss kar raha tha but abhi woh number non reachable ja raha hai. To kyuki agar mai apne platform pe dekh raha hu na.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: To mold ka lead available hai abhi yaha pe. Usi ke liye maine unko ek mail share kiya tha. Shayad aapke register email ID pe aaya hoga mera mail.
Executive: Kaunsa mold kya lead aaya?
Customer: Ye aapka career hai ek to, thik hai. Column mold ka bhi hai, FRP bhi hai, RCC bhi hai, carbon fiber bhi hai. Silicon bhi hai.
Executive: Multiple type ke hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi lead lead ki baat kar raha hu lead nahi aa raha hai MS mold ke regarding aur jo category ki baat karo category woh solution nahi aa raha hai.
Customer: Matlab mai samajh nahi pa raha hu sir.
Executive: Category jo keywords se aane chahiye na jaise box culvert hai ya retaining wall hai specific woh aapke standard jo aapne diye hai wohi aa raha hai. Aur uske accordingly jo lead aana chahiye woh mold ke nahi aa rahe hai concrete ke aa rahe hai. Iske liye hum log category banwane ke liye insist kar rahe the sir.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir woh category ke liye last bar me aapka baat hua tha na Nancy se. Usne isko escalate bhi kiya tha but kya hai ki woh category create nahi kar sakte hum kyuki uss wali category me world pe utna footfall nahi hai.
Customer: Footfall nahi hai par hamara woh concept clear hi nahi hua na to to fir agar koi nayi company entry maar raha hai to uska product naya hai to aap to aap bolte ho ke aapka footfall nahi hai aapke woh keywords me traffic nahi hota to aapki kaise hoga naya product hai to. Woh to pura time jaane ke baad traffic hoga. To uska matlab aapke naya company ko aap khali andar insist evolve kar lete ho fir baad me ye sab naya naya late ho ke ye nahi aa raha hai keywords nahi aa raha hai to uska koi matlab nahi hai na fir.
Executive: Nahi jaise aapka ye platform hai.
Customer: Agar mera platform pe mera keyword search nahi kar paau jo mai customize hum log jo core business hai hamara. Jo hamara kya dusra koi bhi nahi kar raha hai aur uska aap keyword andar involve nahi kar rahe ho to mera koi platform kaam ka hi nahi hai jiske liye maine ispe paise dala hai hamara business.
Executive: Nahi nahi aapka bhi kehna correct hai but sir isme na ek question ye bhi hai agar hum isko generate bhi kar denge na to woh lead generate ho hi nahi raha hai. To fir aapko woh zero zero hi dikhega waha pe. To jab tak ispe na ek particular limit set hai. Uss set tak agar ispe footfall aane lagta hai to fir IndiaMART usko automatically usko create kar deta hai woh category ko.
Customer: To woh to aap category daloge uske baad aap woh la paoge na. Tab tak to woh kisi ko malum nahi padega dusra koi product banana padega ban jayega. Hum abhi yaha kya kar rahe hai. To fir chalo dusra koi product vendor hai usse woh category kahi se keywords mil gaya aur woh chalu kar diya to hamara to business matlab woh start nahi hua na usko lead mil gaya. Kyuki time to time woh product sab banane lagte hai.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: To hamara platform kaam ka hi nahi raha na woh. Hame woh bolna chah raha hu standard product to sab banate hai. Woh hum log bhi banate hai uska koi matlab nahi hai woh to online platform chalo thik hai banane ke liye hum log bhi add kar diya hai. Par jo main customize hai jisse hum deal karte hai aur jo hamara core work hai hamara core platform hai jiske liye hum log ispe platform use kar rahe hai. Aur aap bol rahe ho ke aapki team bol rahi hai ke woh kaam nahi hai keywords nahi hai traffic nahi ho raha hai nahi kar paoge to woh kuch kaam ka nahi hai platform fir.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: IndiaMART khali platform hamare liye khali standard product ke liye hai aisa hua. Hmm. Uska solution kariye fir mere ko bataiye. Haan aapka management team se bhi baat kiya hai sales wale team se baat kiya hai design team se baat kiya hai aap fir abhi aap ek mahine Diwali se mai piche pad raha hu sabke ki mere to ye solution chahiye solution chahiye to koi sab goli ghumata hai. Koi iska mail deta hai koi uska mail deta hai koi uska number deta hai. Sab khali samajhte hai haan haan samajh pad gaya par koi solution koi nahi de raha hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm. Nahi nahi hamare paas jaise aapne jo exact bola hai na waisa nahi hai jaise ek aapne MS beam mold ka bola tha thik hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To hamare paas MS beam mold nahi hai lekin beam mold ka category hai.
Customer: Mai to mai bhi samajh jo hai uski baat nahi kar raha hu nahi hai uski baat kar raha hu. Woh hai usme samajh raha hu woh to mai appreciate kar raha hu chalo thik hai uska koi tension nahi hai woh to hum direct aapko team add kar dega ya mai aap jaise suggest karoge hum log woh check follow karke usse kar rahe ho. Par jo nahi hai aur jispe hamara core business matlab hamara jiske liye hum hum log usse reach karne wale hai market market me kyuki hum log customize banate hai customize koi banata nahi hai iske liye samajh gaya baat woh. To aisa nahi kar rahe ho to standard product ka koi matlab hi nahi hai woh to hum log directly deal kar sakte hai product se.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Aap iska solution karo aur management team se baat karna hai jisse bhi baat karna hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi actually sir ye maine baat kar liya hai jaise aapka ye precast drain tha ek hai na. To precast drain ka hamare paas nahi hai lekin drain mold ka hamare paas tha.
Customer: Woh to sab malum hai drain mold hai box culvert hai ye hai woh mold woh mold hai woh sab me common hi dala hai woh char panch mold standard hai kyuki wohi itni bar aapko chothi bar sun raha hu woh sab standard product hai woh sab bana rahe hai. Woh sab matlab standard ho gaya hai woh common ho gaya hai bana sakte hai. Haan haan haan haan. Hum log customize banate hai matlab client ke hisab se requirement ke hisab se hum log naya naya product develop karte hai. Uske keywords ke liye aapke suggest kar raha hu.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Maine woh maine apni team ko kiya tha mail but waha se hamare paas yahi respond aaya hai ki ye wali jo category aap bata rahe ho na matlab mai jo unko bata raha tha to unme na utna footfall nahi aa raha tha to agar hum usko generate bhi kar denge to uske alawa aapko utna kuch milega nahi.
Customer: Ek kaam karo abhi aap apni team aur management team jo bhi hai technical team hai usse meeting arrange karo hum log meri management team se arrange kare kyuki mai abhi ye Diwali se try kar raha hu kuch solution nahi aa raha hai mere ko solution se matlab hai. To hi hum log aage baat karenge thik hai. Aap aage meeting technical team jo bhi hai aapka senior management hai jo decision lekar hai aisa nahi fir design team wale ko laya fir design team accountant team ko laya accountant team usko laya sab gol gol ghuma kar do mere ko final chahiye warna mai meri management team se bolta hu ke hamara platform ka aapka renewal humko paise wapis de do aur humko platform me kaam ka nahi hai. Fir seedha seedha baat karo.
Executive: Thik hai thik hai.
Customer: Mai ek kaam karta hu kal fir ek kal dupahar kal subah 11:30 baje ke aas paas mai ek meeting align karta hu fir aapke sath. Mai bhi samajh raha hu isliye haan matlab wohi bhi bol raha hu aapko management team iske liye involve karne bola kyuki decision woh lete hai aap nahi le sakte. Sir ji actually mera aapse baat hua bhi tha last bar 10 11 tarikh ke aas paas maine baat kiya tha aapse. To actually uss time pe maine aapse bola tha ki haan mai dekhta hu iska agar kuch to maine apni taraf se na isko best possible dekh liya hai but waha se na hame no aa gaya hai ki matlab usme footfall nahi hai to hum usko create nahi kar sakte. Haan to isi liye ek bar mai aapse baat karta hu isme na aur meeting arrange karao warna warna fir thik hai kal subah thik hai aapka jo register email ID hai na uspe mai dalunga aapko. Haan haan. To kal morning me 10:30 baje ke aas paas kar lenge aap 10:30 11 baje. Haan chalega chalega. Thik hai thik hai ye WhatsApp number hai na ispe bhi mai aapko. Haan ye WhatsApp number hai aur mail mail pe kar doge to bhi chalega hum log mera team bhi aa jayega aur hum log bhi aa jayenge. Thik hai thik hai ye primary number kiska tha 807 last me?
Executive: Haan woh Krinal karke ek banda hai woh usko bhi mai bol dunga ke woh bhi available rahega.
Customer: Achha achha thik hai thik hai. Warna agar kuch meeting ya koi client aata hai to hum log aapko inform kar denge.
Executive: Thik hai thik hai.
Customer: Okay okay. Okay okay. Hmm.
summary:
Concerns:

- Leads are not specific to MS mold.

- Category solution not appearing as expected.

- Dissatisfied with IndiaMART's platform for customized products.

- Feels new companies are not supported.



Resolution:

- Executive acknowledged the customer's concerns.

- Agreed to arrange a meeting with technical team.

- Will align a meeting at 11:30 AM next day.



Next Steps: 

- Meeting to be scheduled with technical team.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, category, refund, meeting
